title: Suns, Heat go up 2-0 in series
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Suns going up 2-0 in the series vs the Dallas Mavericks. Chris Paul took it over in the 4th and absolutely dominated Luka on the pick and roll. Find out what the guys think the Mavericks need to get back in this series. The Heat dominate the 76ers to go up 2-0 in their series. Also, the Miami Heat deserve all the credit for the job they are doing, but James Harden continues to struggle. The guys tell you where his issues lie and what the 76ers need to do to bounce back. Also, Nasa is sending nudes to aliens. Find out why the guys think they are making one big mistake. All this and more.
